values: 支付；偿还；交纳；给予（注意、尊重等）；承担（后果、代价）；受到（惩罚、奖励）；报答；赢利；付代价
薪水；报酬；薪资；工资；酬劳；收入；待遇；薪酬；工钱
需付费的；有关支付的；矿藏丰富的；含贵重矿物的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 应付的；到期的；可付的；可获利的
付款，支付；报酬，报答；偿还；惩罚，报应
（导弹、火箭等的）有效载荷，有效负荷；收费载重，酬载；（工厂、企业等）工资负担

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指提供某种服务收取的固定费用。
多指通过劳动或投资等手段所得到的收入。
多用复数形式，指按小时、日或星期的报酬，通常指体力劳动者的工资。
与earnings含义很相近，但前者强调总收入。
指按年定下，按月或星期平均给予的报酬，指脑力劳动者的薪水。

word_group.brief_definition: 注意, 重视, 关注
支付, 付钱, 买单
取得成功, 得到好结果
得到报酬；拿到报酬；拿到薪水

bilingual.source: Customers pay for them with a credit card.
You will not have to pay much for it.
bilingual.target: 你不需要为此支付很多费用。

bilingual.source: This is money you have to pay as a punishment.
bilingual.target: 这是你必须支付的罚款。

bilingual.source: We want to raise money to pay for our programme.
bilingual.target: 我们想筹钱支付我们的项目。

bilingual.source: Would you prefer to barter or pay with money?
bilingual.target: 你更喜欢以物易物还是用钱支付？

bilingual.source: Many Chinese people often pay with mobile phones now.
bilingual.target: 现在很多中国人经常用手机进行支付。

bilingual.source: You must pay for your course at least one month before it starts.
bilingual.target: 你必须在课程开始前至少一个月支付课程费用。

bilingual.source: They need to raise 5,000,000 US dollars in order to pay for the repairs.
bilingual.target: 为了支付修理费用，他们需要筹集500万美元。

bilingual.source: If you lose the bet, you must pay 20,000, and you can't eat your words!
bilingual.target: 如果你输了赌注，你必须支付两万英镑，而且你不能食言！

bilingual.source: She and her friends now organise events and collect money to pay for private teachers.
bilingual.target: 她和朋友们现在组织活动并筹集资金支付私人教师。

list.abstract: pay（英[peɪ]，美[peɪ]），英语单词。作动词时，释义为付钱给；偿还；付出代价。作名词时，释义为工资；薪金。短语搭配为pay attention to（注意）。例句为“Now people can pay by scanning their faces while shopping.（现在人们可以在购物时通过扫描脸来支付。）” pay的现在分词为paying，过去分词为paid。其反义词为default，及物动词近义词有replace、foot、tender，不及物动词近义词有shell out、repay，名词性近义词有payment、salary、wage。

yingyinNormal.en: Speaking of truth, I need you to pay Sandra for the seminar.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说到实话，你们得向桑德拉支付本次座谈会的费用。

yingyinNormal.en: Through developing mobile payment, we can now use apps to pay in nearly all the situations, even to make an appointment with the doctors.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通过不断发展的移动支付方式，我们现在能用手机应用软件在几乎任何情境下支付，甚至能预约医生。

yingyinNormal.en: We? I wondered if Edith might like to come. Keep me company. I'll pay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们？伊迪丝也许也想去，跟我作伴。我会支付费用的。

yingyinNormal.en: As such, he bears responsibility for all your infractions and must pay all fines.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，他对你的违规行为负有全责，并必须支付罚款。

yingyinNormal.en: I've been wiped out. I'll be lucky if I can pay my kid's tuition, if I make it out of here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我赔了个精光，支付孩子的学费都吃力就算能活着出去。

yingyinNormal.en: It would help around 28 million Americans from all walks of life pay the bills provide for their kids, and spend that money at local businesses.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这将帮助全美2800万人民有能力支付日常支出，抚养孩子并在当地消费。

yingyinNormal.en: And I've done what I can on my own by requiring federal contractors to pay their workers at least ten-ten an hour.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我已经做了我能做得事情，要求联邦的承包商支付给他们员工的工资最少是每小时$10.10。

yingyinNormal.en: Dear Mr. Pig, please pay your telephone bill. Oh. What's a bill? It sounds very boring. Bills are very boring.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的猪先生，请你支付你的电话账单。噢天啊！什么是账单啊？它听上去非常的无聊。账单确实是非常的无聊。

yingyinNormal.en: I had to cut my losses so that my company, Bridgewater, was left with one employee, me. I was so broke, I had to borrow $4000, from my dad to pay my bills. But even worse was having to let go the people I cared so much about.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了减少损失，我的公司Bridgewater，只剩下了一个员工就是我自己。我彻底破产，被迫向我父亲借了4000美金支付我的账单。更痛苦的是放弃那些我曾经非常在乎的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Why would we pay you off?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们为什么要用钱打发你？

yingyinNormal.en: Pay the cashier. Sheldon Cooper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 去交罚金。谢尔顿·库珀。

yingyinNormal.en: You work hard, you pay your taxes…
yingyinNormal.zh: 工作努力，交税…

yingyinNormal.en: Did he pay you back? No, but he will.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他把钱还给你了吗？没有，不过他会还的。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't pay any attention to him. Manny.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不要理他。

yingyinNormal.en: Exactly. You could pay off your mortgage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错 你可以用它来还房贷。

yingyinNormal.en: Perhaps it is time I pay them a visit. No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是不是该会会他们。糟糕。

yingyinNormal.en: Here. Take some. Pay me back when you can.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来吧，拿一些，等你有钱了再还我。

yingyinNormal.en: How much can that pay? Every little bit helps.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那能挣多少钱？聚沙成塔。

yingyinNormal.en: So you're never actually going to pay me back?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你打算不还我钱？

yingyinNormal.en: I will take your kindness, and pay it forward.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我感谢你的善良，我要报答你。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 予以(关注); 致以(问候)
付出代价; 遭受惩罚
访问(某人); 打电话给

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 支付；付款；支付的款项；赔偿；酬劳；报偿；报酬

word_family.mean: v. 付钱给；偿还；付出代价；受到惩罚；予以；致以；表达；用沥青（或焦油）填塞（甲板或木船接缝）以防止漏水；惩罚；奖赏

examination_example.sentence: Do people get on without <highlight>paying</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们会不付钱就上车吗？

examination_example.sentence: Are there inspectors to check that people have <highlight>paid</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有查票员检查人们是否已经付款吗？

examination_example.sentence: Worse, the crucial income to feed yourself and your family and <highlight>pay</highlight> the bills has disappeared.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更糟糕的是，用于养家糊口以及支付账单的关键收入已经不复存在了。

sense_info_list.en: the money you receive for doing a job

examination_example.sentence: The common idea that high CEO <highlight>pay</highlight> is mainly about ripping people off doesn't explain history very well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们普遍认为，首席执行官的高薪主要是为了坑骗他人，这种观点并不能很好地解释历史。

examination_example.sentence: Other industries are recruiting them with similar or better <highlight>pay</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他行业正以相近或更高的薪酬招聘他们。

examination_example.sentence: His father was a clerk in the British Navy <highlight>pay</highlight> office — a respectable position, but with little social status.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的父亲是一名英国海军薪酬办公室的职员——一个体面的职位，但没有什么社会地位。

sense_info_list.zh: 予以(关注); 致以(问候)

examination_example.sentence: In adulthood, looking someone else in a pleasant way can be a complimentary sign of <highlight>paying</highlight> attention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成年后，以一种愉快的方式看着别人可能是一种表示关注的赞美信号。

examination_example.sentence: In a social situation, eye contact with another person can show that you are <highlight>paying</highlight> attention in a friendly way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在社交场合，与他人的眼神交流可以表明你正在以友好的方式关注对方。

examination_example.sentence: Policymakers in the UK are <highlight>paying</highlight> less attention to GDP.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国的政策制定者对GDP（国内生产总值）的关注越来越少。

sense_info_list.en: have a worthwhile result; be worth the effort or pains required

examination_example.sentence: In this age of generalists, it <highlight>pays</highlight> to have specific knowledge or skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这个通才时代，拥有特定的知识或技能是值得的。

examination_example.sentence: You can't help feeling that the Scottish artist has simply found a way of making his love of walking <highlight>pay</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你不禁会觉得，这位苏格兰艺术家只是找到了一种方式，使他对步行的热爱有所回报。

sense_info_list.zh: 付出代价; 遭受惩罚
访问(某人); 打电话给

word_usage.usage:
表示“工资、薪水”
pay的使用范围很广，只要是工作所得都可以用pay。
income指收入、收益、所得。
wage通常指按小时或按周领取的工资、工钱。
salary通常指按月发放的薪水、薪金。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 泛指所得的报酬，为不可数名词。
比pay更加正式，是可数名词，而且经常用复数。
指体力劳动所得的报酬，如熟练工人、售货员等的固定工资，可按小时、按天、或按周领取。
指脑力劳动所得的报酬，如工程师、教师、政府官员、管理人员等的固定薪金，可按周、按月、按季或按年领取。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 未付清的；未偿还的；不收报酬的；不带薪的；不领取报酬的
n. 付款人；支付者；交款人
n. 收费载重；酬载；乘客和货物；炸弹弹头；有效荷载
n. 发工资；结果；报酬；收益
n. 支付；付款；支付的款项；赔偿；酬劳；报偿；报酬
n. 薪水；付薪水的支票

word_family.mean: v. 付钱给；偿还；付出代价；受到惩罚；予以；致以；表达；用沥青（或焦油）填塞（甲板或木船接缝）以防止漏水；惩罚；奖赏

examination_example.sentence: Inquiring about their salary to be <highlight>paid</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 询问他们的工资。

examination_example.sentence: I wouldn't go back to the crippling self-consciousness of my youth if you <highlight>paid</highlight> me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使你付钱给我，我也不会回到我年轻时那种极度自卑的状态。

examination_example.sentence: They don't seem to mind <highlight>paying</highlight> for additional services.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们似乎不介意为额外服务付费。

sense_info_list.en: the money you receive for doing a job

examination_example.sentence: I'm not referring to employees who are legitimately dissatisfied with their employment conditions due to, say, being denied fair <highlight>pay</highlight> or flexible work practices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我指的不是那些因为被拒绝公平薪酬或弹性工作制而对自己的工作条件产生合理不满的员工。

examination_example.sentence: They often work without any <highlight>pay</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们经常无偿工作。

sense_info_list.en: have a worthwhile result; be worth the effort or pains required

word_usage.usage: pay表示“付某人多少钱”时，直接接双宾语，不需要用介词。如：He paid me ten yuan.

pay作名词“工资，薪水”时是不可数名词，前面不能加a。如：
办公室工作人员中很少有人挣大钱的。
误 Very few office workers get a good pay.
正 Very few office workers get good pay.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 发工资；结果；报酬；收益
adj. 未付清的；未偿还的；不收报酬的；不带薪的；不领取报酬的
n. 支付；付款；支付的款项；赔偿；酬劳；报偿；报酬
n. 薪水；付薪水的支票

word_family.mean: v. 付钱给；偿还；付出代价；受到惩罚；予以；致以；表达；用沥青（或焦油）填塞（甲板或木船接缝）以防止漏水；惩罚；奖赏

examination_example.sentence: The café doesn't use volunteers, but <highlight>pays</highlight> its staff to ensure consistency in its service.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这家咖啡馆没有使用志愿者，而是给员工发工资，以确保服务的一致性。

examination_example.sentence: The practice of <highlight>paying</highlight> children an allowance became popular in America about 100 years ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大约在100年前，给孩子零花钱的做法开始在美国流行。

examination_example.sentence: What do some experts think about <highlight>paying</highlight> children for doing chores?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于为孩子做家务付报酬一事，一些专家怎么看？

sense_info_list.en: the money you receive for doing a job

examination_example.sentence: "There could be a number of reasons," he said, "for example, people do many things to make themselves happier: they strive for promotion or <highlight>pay</highlight> rises, or they get married.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说：“可能有很多原因，例如，人们做了很多令自己开心的事情：他们努力争取升职或加薪，或者结婚。”

examination_example.sentence: They want jobs that provide security and flexibility, and they place relatively little importance on high <highlight>pay</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她们关心的是这份工作能否给她们以安全感、是否具有灵活性，对高薪资的重视程度相对较低。

examination_example.sentence: UK researchers found moving to a green space had a sustained positive effect, unlike <highlight>pay</highlight> rises or promotions, which only provided a short-term boost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国研究人员发现，搬到有绿地的地方会带来持续的积极影响，这与升职加薪不同，后者只会带来短期的促进作用。

examination_example.sentence: He said the people who should be <highlight>paying</highlight> regard to the Wang paper are the funding agents who distribute government grant money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说，应该关注王教授论文的人是发放政府补助金的资金代理人。

examination_example.sentence: My advice is that you not <highlight>pay</highlight> attention to the number of steps and ingredients, because they can be deceiving.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的建议是，你不要在意有多少步骤和成分，因为它们可能具有欺骗性。

examination_example.sentence: They will <highlight>pay</highlight> more attention to the quality of their products.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们将会更加注意产品的质量。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>pays</highlight> to explore what can be done to meet the academic, social and emotional challenges of the transition to high school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 探索如何应对升入高中后的学术、社会和情感挑战是值得的。

word_usage.usage: pay表示“付某人多少钱”时，直接接双宾语，不需要用介词。如：He paid me ten yuan.

pay作名词“工资，薪水”时是不可数名词，前面不能加a。如：
办公室工作人员中很少有人挣大钱的。
误 Very few office workers get a good pay.
正 Very few office workers get good pay.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 赢利; 创收; 受益

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 预付；预支；预付邮资的
n. 支付；付款；支付的款项；赔偿；酬劳；报偿；报酬
adj. 未付清的；未偿还的；不收报酬的；不带薪的；不领取报酬的

word_family.mean: v. 付钱给；偿还；付出代价；受到惩罚；予以；致以；表达；用沥青（或焦油）填塞（甲板或木船接缝）以防止漏水；惩罚；奖赏

examination_example.sentence: And his dad, Albert, took the money my dad earned and used it to <highlight>pay</highlight> family expenses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而他的爸爸艾伯特，拿着我爸爸赚的钱，用来支付家庭开支。

examination_example.sentence: Georgia did decide to donate toys to a little girl whose mother was unable to <highlight>pay</highlight> for her holiday due to illness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乔治亚决定捐赠玩具给一个小女孩，其母亲因病无法支付假期的费用。

examination_example.sentence: But I don't like the idea of <highlight>paying</highlight> three months for an empty apartment, either.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是我也不喜欢为一套空公寓付三个月的房租。

sense_info_list.zh: 赢利; 创收; 受益

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>pays</highlight> to put theory into practice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把理论付诸实践是值得的。

examination_example.sentence: The environmental challenges are significant but the efforts made by the Tanzania National Park Authority seem to be <highlight>paying</highlight> off .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 环境挑战是巨大的，但是坦桑尼亚国家公园管理局所做的努力似乎得到了回报。

examination_example.sentence: So it <highlight>pays</highlight> to be sure, because you want to get it right the first time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以确保万无一失是值得的，因为你希望第一次就做对。

examination_example.sentence: When listening to them, <highlight>pay</highlight> attention to words that sound strange.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 听的时候，注意那些听起来很奇怪的单词。

examination_example.sentence: What should you <highlight>pay</highlight> most attention to when taking notes?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 做笔记的时候最应该注意什么？

examination_example.sentence: But in this experiment what they're doing is <highlight>paying</highlight> more attention to the big number than the little one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是在这个实验中，他们所做的是更多地关注大数字而不是小数字。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>pay</highlight> arrived at last.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工资终于发下来了。

examination_example.sentence: It was tiring work, but I looked forward to the <highlight>pay</highlight>, even though I wasn't sure how much it would amount to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一份累人的工作，但我期待着报酬，尽管我不确定会有多少。

examination_example.sentence: Mary became a baker at age 14, because her grandfather <highlight>paid</highlight> the local baker to teach her all the skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 玛丽14岁时成为面包师，因为她的祖父付钱给当地的面包师，教她所有的技能。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 予以(关注); 致以(问候)

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 得到报酬；拿到报酬；拿到薪水

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 未付清的；未偿还的；不收报酬的；不带薪的；不领取报酬的
n. 支付；付款；支付的款项；赔偿；酬劳；报偿；报酬

word_family.mean: v. 付钱给；偿还；付出代价；受到惩罚；予以；致以；表达；用沥青（或焦油）填塞（甲板或木船接缝）以防止漏水；惩罚；奖赏

examination_example.sentence: You can only get a little <highlight>pay</highlight> but learn a lot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你只能拿到一点点报酬，但可以学到很多东西。

examination_example.sentence: How often are the workers <highlight>paid</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工人们多久发一次工资？

examination_example.sentence: Just go to our website, fill in your information, choose a seat and <highlight>pay</highlight> online.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只需访问我们的网站，填写您的信息，选择座位并在线支付即可。

sense_info_list.zh: 予以(关注); 致以(问候)

examination_example.sentence: In the COVID-19 pandemic (新冠肺炎疫情), people across the world are <highlight>paying</highlight> more attention to the health and happiness of each other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在新冠肺炎疫情期间，世界各地的人们都更加关注彼此的健康和幸福。

examination_example.sentence: All the students have to <highlight>pay</highlight> attention to the pronunciation of each word.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有学生都必须注意每个单词的发音。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Pay</highlight> attention to safety during the planting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 种植过程中注意安全。

examination_example.sentence: I will <highlight>pay</highlight> you back with my allowance until I return all the money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我会用我的零用钱还钱，直到还清。

examination_example.sentence: He told her that if she really wanted to <highlight>pay</highlight> him back, the next time she saw someone who needed help, she could give them the help they needed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他告诉她，如果她真的想回报他，下次她看到需要帮助的人时，她可以给他们所需要的帮助。

examination_example.sentence: You always have to <highlight>pay</highlight> it back.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你总是要还的。

sense_info_list.en: have a worthwhile result; be worth the effort or pains required

examination_example.sentence: The hours he spent on the playground and doing sit-ups have <highlight>paid</highlight> off!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他花费在操场上和做仰卧起坐上的时间得到了回报！

examination_example.sentence: It was a day when Lucy learned that perseverance <highlight>pays</highlight> off．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那天，露西认识到坚持是有回报的。

examination_example.sentence: But effort <highlight>pays</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但努力是有回报的。

examination_example.sentence: If you cheat, you will <highlight>pay</highlight> soon enough.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你作弊，你很快就会付出代价。

examination_example.sentence: But if you waste too much food, you need to <highlight>pay</highlight> for it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是如果你浪费了太多的食物，你需要为此付出代价。

examination_example.sentence: Someday, you will <highlight>pay</highlight> 20 times the cost for breaking your promise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总有一天，你会为违背诺言付出20倍的代价。

sense_info_list.en: the money you receive for doing a job

word_usage.usage:
pay的主语是人，常和介词for搭配。
如：I paid two hundred yuan for the dress.
我花了两百元买那条裙子。
pay表示“付某人多少钱”时，直接接双宾语，不需要用介词。如：He paid me ten yuan.

pay作名词“工资，薪水”时是不可数名词，前面不能加a。如：
办公室工作人员中很少有人挣大钱的。
误 Very few office workers get a good pay.
正 Very few office workers get good pay.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation:
常用于表示“花钱”，主语多是事或物。常见搭配是“Sth. costs sb.+钱数”。
例：A full day’s activities will cost you £45.
全天的活动收费为45英镑。（朗文）

常用于表示“花钱”，主语是人，和介词for搭配。常见搭配是"sb. pays some money for sth."。
例：She pays £200 a week for this apartment.
这套房子她每周要付租金200英镑。（牛津）

既可以表示“花时间”，也可以表示“花钱”，主语是人。常见搭配是“sb. spends some money/time on sth./（in） doing sth."。
例：My sister spends most of her money on clothes.
我姐姐把大多数钱都花在衣服上了。

常用于表示“花时间”。常见搭配是"It takes sb. some time to do sth. ” 或"sth. takes sb. some time”。
例：It took me two hours to finish the model plane.
完成那个飞机模型花了我两个小时的时间。
